import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-homepage', templateUrl: './homepage.component.html', styleUrls: ['./homepage.component.css'] }) export class HomepageComponent { cartItemCount = 0; // Default cart count constructor() {} addToCart() { this.cartItemCount++; // Simulates adding items to the cart } }
